roles.title: Data Scientist
roles.description:
• Develop scalable data processing pipelines for nationwide tutoring RCT in Python, R, makefile, and YAML.
• Evaluate heterogenous treatment effects of tutoring implementation on ~10,000 students in study.
• Support school district partners by building interactive data dashboards and training on-site technical staff.

roles.title: Quantitative Reserach Assistant
roles.description:
• Led data procurement and cleaning efforts for Human Exploitation and Resiliency Initiative with Dr. Meredith Dank
• Developed data approach for novel prevalence estimation methodology for human trafficking estimation in Belize

roles.title: Teaching Associate
roles.description:
• Tutored underserved 8-14 year-olds in the fundamentals of speech and debate
• Managed student membership and developed online learning modules to enhance student learning and retention

roles.title: Benchmarking and Compliance Intern
roles.description:
• Procured and analyzed over 700 building energy usage reports for compliance with Fannie Mae Green Loans
• Streamlined data collection efforts by obtaining energy consumption data request processes for over 50 new utilities

roles.title: Research Assistant
roles.description:
• Assisted Dr. Steve Viscelli on project assessing viability and sustainability of autonomous electric truck fleet 
• Produced literature reviews to help drive key focus for research in largely unexplored area of autonomous freighting

name: Department of Sociology, University of Pennsylvania

roles.title: Research Assistant
roles.description:
• Supported Dr. Courtney Boen on project using Twitter data to evaluate mental health impacts of high-profile police killings 
• Synthesized research; conducted preliminary regressions on initial data; formulated visualizations of text-based data

name: Penn Program on Opinion Research and Election Studies

roles.title: Research Assistant
roles.description:
• Analyzed strategic census data to georeference refugee movements in Cyprus using ArcGIS 
• Integrated and cleaned large open-source data into functional dataset using R, STATA, and Excel
